Template Struct padding¶

  • Defined in File quickpool.hxx

Inheritance Relationships¶

Base Type¶

  • public std::conditional::type

Struct Documentation¶

template<typename T, size_t Align>
struct padding : public std::conditional::type¶

Class holding padding bytes is necessary. Classes can inherit from this to automically add padding if necessary.
